pr_title: Add Mutual SSL property to service catalog entry

timeline.message: Add Mutual SSL property to service catalog entry

timeline.author: fazlan-nazeem
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1864,6 +1864,7 @@ CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS SERVICE_CATALOG_ENTRY (
   SERVICE_TYPE VARCHAR(20),
   SERVICE_CATEGORY VARCHAR(50),
   SECURITY_TYPE VARCHAR(50),
+  MUTUAL_SSL_ENABLED BOOLEAN DEFAULT 0,

replies.bodyText: FALSE is represented as ZERO in SQL
replies.author: ChamodDamitha
